title: Starship upper stage lost on seventh test flight
summary:
SpaceX’s seventh Starship/Super Heavy test flight ended prematurely Jan. 16 when the Starship upper stage was apparently lost while ascending into space.

title: SpaceX completes second catch of lower stage, but loses Starship
summary:
SpaceX completed its seventh launch of Starship on Thursday, accomplishing a clean liftoff and catch of the first-stage booster. However, the upper stage was lost after its ascent. The launch took place just a few minutes after 5 p.m. on the East Coast, as the first attempts at getting Starship in the air for the […]

title: NASA Names David Korth as Deputy, Safety and Mission Assurance Directorate
summary: NASA has selected David Korth as deputy for Johnson Space Center’s Safety and Mission Assurance directorate. title: NASA Names Mary Beth Schwartz as Director, Center Operations Directorate
summary: NASA has selected Mary Beth Schwartz as director of NASA’s Johnson Space Center Center Operations directorate. title: Hubble Reveals Jupiter in Ultraviolet Light
summary: This NASA Hubble Space Telescope image shows the planet Jupiter in a color composite of ultraviolet wavelengths. title: Hubble Captures Young Stars Changing Their Environments
summary: This NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image peers into the dusty recesses of the nearest massive star-forming region to Earth, the Orion Nebula (Messier 42, M42).
